content: Lo sai che in quei centri, per dare il seme, ci dovremo chiudere in una stanzetta a guardare filmini porno?
translations: eng:Do you know that in those centers, in order to give semen, we'll have to lock ourselves in a little room and watch pornï¹–
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by felidad (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
